name: Battle Canyon
description:
This is a prototype build of a small scale strategy game, all assets are placeholder.

What Is Battle Canyon?

Battle Canyon is  simple strategy game, you select the lane, the unit type, and send your (placeholder) warriors into battle! 

The game is won when all 3 enemy spawners are destroyed. 

Development Roadmap:

Phase 1 - Gameplay &  Mechanics.

Phase 2 -  Asset creation & implementation.

Phase 3 - Finalization & Polish.

Currently I'm working on Phase 1, writing the code and mechanics that the core game will utilize. 

Known Bugs:

Unit purchase bug.

Outro:

Thanks for stopping by my page, I hope you get an idea of the game I'm attempting to create, this project is in the very early stages of development,  check back or follow for any future updates.
